definition: filled with vascular sinuses and capable of becoming distended and rigid as the result of being filled with blood
details:
adjective
- filled with vascular sinuses and capable of becoming distended and rigid as the result of being filled with blood
= example: filled with vascular sinuses and capable of becoming distended and rigid as the result of being filled with blood
= synonyms: cavernous
- capable of being raised to an upright position
= example: capable of being raised to an upright position
